bibl.author: Ferdinand von Mueller
bibl.title: QUARTERLY ESTIMATE. ¶ To the Honorable ¶ ¶ the Chief Secretary ¶ Sir, ¶ ¶ I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the Quarter ending ¶ ¶ 30th November ...

encodingDesc.p: The file data/letters/1880-9/1884/84-09-22-final.doc was converted from Microsoft Word format into TEI using an XProc pipeline.

head.supplied: QUARTERLY ESTIMATE. ¶ To the Honorable ¶ ¶ the Chief Secretary ¶ Sir, ¶ ¶ I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the Quarter ending ¶ ¶ 30th November ...

div.p: B84/1156, unit 58, VPRS 3992/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

note.p: MS written by G. Luehmann and signed by M. See also M to G. Berry, 16 September 1884,anestimate for the Quarter ending December, which was initialled by T. Wilson, Under Secretary, but not signed by Berry.

div.p: To the Honorable the Chief Secretary
I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the Quarter ending 30th November 1884.

note.p: The entriesin this columnarein another hand; entered in Chief Secretary's office?The numbers are probably authority numbers for the expenditures in question.

cell.p:
Paper for Lithograms
The line below the amounts in this row has been added, to separate off the totals.
